channel.title: Superstate
channel.description: Superstate is modernizing investing through tokenized financial products

item.title: Introducing Protocol Mint and Redeem for USTB
item.description: Protocol Mint and Redeem are composable functions on Ethereum, built for developers.

item.title: Introducing Continuous Pricing, Offering 24/7/365 Fund Management
item.description: Superstate’s USTB fund now offers continuous pricing, providing 24/7/365 interest accrual and immediate NAV updates, setting a new standard for digital finance.

item.title: Superstate Industry Council Welcomes Second Cohort of Leading Institutions
item.description: Superstate introduces the second cohort of Superstate Industry Council (SIC), a collective of top traditional and digital asset institutions committed to shaping Superstate’s product roadmap and advancing the adoption of tokenization within financial capital markets.

item.title: Introducing the Superstate Crypto Carry Fund (USCC)
item.description: Superstate introduces USCC, a private, tokenized fund designed to provide institutional investors compliant and convenient exposure to the crypto basis trade.

item.title: Mapping the Blockchains Driving Asset Tokenization
item.description: In Chapter 3 of the Book on Tokenization, we learn more about the blockchains where tokenization projects are developing their solutions.

item.title: RWA Summit 2024: Tokenization Insights, Innovations, and Future Considerations Take Center Stage
item.description: The RWA Summit in Austin, TX was a pinnacle event showcasing industry leaders sharing their insights, experiences, and visions for the future of asset tokenization.

item.title: Mapping the Leading Jurisdictions for Tokenization of Assets Today
item.description: Exploring the jurisdictions driving global asset tokenization and the key factors enabling adoption.

item.title: USTB now Enabled for Peer-to-Peer Transfers
item.description: Superstate has enabled the USTB token contract to allow for onchain, peer-to-peer transfers of USTB.

item.title: How Tokenization Upgrades the Utility of $650T in Traditional Assets
item.description: Superstate looks at what assets can be tokenized and the advantages of blockchain tokenization of real-world assets.

item.title: Introducing the Superstate Industry Council (SIC)
item.description: Superstate introduces the Superstate Industry Council (SIC), a collective of top traditional and digital asset investment institutions committed to shaping Superstate’s product roadmap and advancing the adoption of tokenization within traditional financial services and capital markets.

item.title: Introducing the Superstate Short Duration U.S. Government Securities Fund (USTB)
item.description: Superstate reveals its first tokenized fund, Superstate Short Duration U.S. Government Securities Fund (USTB).

item.title: Superstate Announces $14m Series A Financing to Develop Tokenized Funds
item.description: Superstate has secured $14 million in Series A financing to develop regulated tokenized funds, bridging traditional finance with blockchain technology.
